title: Manage an Elevator Malfunction
description: An elevator gets stuck between floors with guests inside.

tasks.description: Receive an alarm from the elevator monitoring system or a call from inside the elevator.
Establish two-way communication with the trapped guests via the elevator's intercom.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent speaks to the guests, reassures them, and confirms no one is injured.

tasks.description: Dispatch the on-site elevator technician to the location immediately.
If the technician cannot resolve it quickly, contact the local fire department for assistance with extraction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows protocol and contacts external emergency services.
